foreignData.text: Wenn einer Deiner Gegner erfolgreich eine fliegende Kreatur beschwört und die Verborgene Spinne eine Verzauberung ist, wird die Verborgene Spinne zu einer 3/5 Kreatur, die als Spinne zählt und die fliegende Kreaturen blocken kann.

name: Hidden Spider
originalText: When one of your opponents successfully casts a creature with flying, if Hidden Spider is an enchantment, Hidden Spider becomes a 3/5 creature that can block creatures with flying and that counts as a Spider.

rulings.text: When it turns into a creature, it is no longer an enchantment.
This card now uses the Reach keyword ability to enable the blocking of flying creatures. This works because a creature with flying can only be blocked by creatures with flying or reach.
The ability only triggers if the creature spell has flying, regardless of whether an effect would cause the creature to have flying once it entered the battlefield.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

text: When an opponent casts a creature spell with flying, if Hidden Spider is an enchantment, Hidden Spider becomes a 3/5 Spider creature with reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
